title: Black scren on load and error message
body:
Two games in a row now, I have gone through champ select and then I get a black screen when the game tries to load. It waits for a bit and then I get this alert box message: "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."

I've tried reconnecting multiple times, reconnecting to my internet, restarting the LoL client. The first time, I tried reconnecting at least 15 times, and had to wait for a good 25 minutes before I could queue for another game because apparently my team didn't remake. Now this same issue has occurred and I have no idea what to do.

I'm playing on the legacy client and have never had this problem before. There is nothing to indicate a bad network connection because I'm able to use the client chat and I'm obviously writing on the boards via the same connection.

replies.body:
Just launch it with --no-sandbox parameter. it helped me to solve "nothing appearing, then black screen" issue

I.e. create shortcut of it and open properties, at the end add that parameter so it will look like

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe" --no-sandbox
Didn't work. I get bugsplat now.

Black screens like this usually indicates a network problem failing to connect to the game server.  The error message you're receiving seems to affirm that case for your specific issue.  I know you've tried to resolve this already, and I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions.

No you didn't resolve anything. Turning off sandbox mode helps to solve this issue.
Gonna add that I haven't been hit with a leaverbuster delay for either instance. Seems the client is aware that something broke, but obviously I don't want to risk it again.
